natha.ෙwanasak thibunada,eeෙwanasa dakagatha hakek sitha athulatha misa bahira ෙpanuem ෙnoew.emaabha nthara ayahapath ෙperana ෙkelas,niwarana,sanෙyojana,drushti aadi namwalin handinew.eෙsenamwalin handinewathath wiwidha awasthawaladi eewa enaminma idiripath ෙnoew.ෙboehowita sithiwiliha hangim mangin pudgaleyakuwa ෙnomanga yawa yahapath eewa ෙlasa huwa dakwamin ayahapath ෙperanaathiwana bawa salakillata ganima wadagathya.ෙmese athiwiemdi eewa chiththa wanychaka dharma yanuewanhandinew.sihi nuwanin salakillata ganima mangin ෙmabandu rawatimwalin walaki katayuthukala haka.ෙmahidi kiyawata wada ෙchthanaew wadagathkama awadharanaya kara dakwa atheth atham awasthawaladipitathin wida mana swarupayata wada hathpasinma ෙwanath swawarupayak pudgalayaeg abha nthara sithathula kiyathmaka wiya haki bawini.ෙm nisa yemaku sidukarana yamkisi kiyawak mathupitin pamanakmanirikshanaya kara in pudgala abha ntharaya pilibandawa winishchayanta elambaiem athi aෙyoga thawayadawatahagatha yuthuya.sutha ෙdshanawaladi karmapala wipaka bihiwanuey ෙchthanawa anuwabawa dakew.15 ෙm abha nthara ෙperanawalada wiwidha mattam thieb.niwarana nameyan dakewanuey niwanmargaya aawaranaya karana karunu pahaki.eewa pancha niwarana dharma namin handinew.eeta wada siyumwuabha nthara ෙperana dahayak sitha thula eeta yata thiebana stharaya thula kiyathmaka ෙw.ෙm dashasanෙyojananam ෙw.sanෙyoga yanu sasarata pudgalaya banda thabana karunu bawini.ෙmwatada yatin anusaya dharmanam wu thawath ithama siyum anu sahagatha wu abha nthara ෙperana samuyak thieb.anusaya yanu siyum yanuew.sutha ෙdshanawala dakewana karunu mangin ෙmahi dakewana awasana piyawara walata langawiemdi eepawathina awasthaew sitha thula ෙgodanangi athi abha nthara ෙperana siyalelanma sitha mudawaganimataawasha ya.ee sandaha sudusu bhawana kamayak atha.eya buduraduneg ෙsoyaganimaki.widarshana bhawanawayanuewan handinewanen ee kamewdayayi.widarshana bhawanawa ekthara darshanika chinthanayaki.ehimukha haraya pagnyawa awadhi karaganimayi.sudusu paridi sitha hikmawimata samath sutha ෙdshanawak shawanayawimamangin shawakaya thula widarshana bhawanawa waedannata salaswiya haka.buduwaruneg samukansikedshanawa wu chathurarya satha kulu ganwu ෙdshana mangin shawakaya mangapala awebodhayata pathkirimatahakiyawa atha.buduwaru ha unwahaneseeg mul ෙpel arhath bhikshunwahanesela sutha ෙdshanaedshana kirima mangin pamanak shawayakin margapala awebodhayata pathkarawanuey widarshanabhawanapiliewatha ෙdshana madha yathulin waedannata salaswiemani.eya itha apahasu karyayaki.namudu eyakala haka.eya kirimata samathkam athi uthuman danata warthamana samajey nathiwiya haka.manda eyakirimata sudusukam sampurna karathibu uthuman ෙm wana wita sasara nimakara awasanwu ෙhayini.ෙmakaladaknata atheth wasara dahas gananan kalaya ikuthwa yaeman pasuwa ෙboehoekotama nashtaesheshawi yaeman anathuruwa ithiriwu athi sanshiptha sutha ෙdshanaya.eewa ෙpara budu muwin nikuthwu suthedshanawala warthawak ha samanaya.aananda himiyan ha ෙsasu shawaka himiwarun wisin wiwidha awasthawaladithaman asu buddha ෙdshana ha ෙdshanawala arthakathana wartha swarupeyan sangruhitha kala hadathalasutha ෙdshanawanhi nirupithaya.eewa hakithak mul ෙdshana aruthata samipewamin sajiwiwa pawathwaganimata darana lada uthsahayak attakathawala nirupithaya.16 widarshana bhawanawa darshanika awebodhayak athiwima aramunu kara pawathi.ee darshanika gnyanaawebodhaya padanamkara ෙgana athiew.ෙmama awebodhaya nam niwan awebodhayayi.abha nthara gathawaathiwana wiwidha ahithakara abhieperana walin sitha nidahas karaganima ෙm awebodhey athi
